wikitext.*:
'''KYELEP''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "[[silver]]".<ref>{{PM|XI}}, p. 366 (note 61; root appearing as "KYELEP")</ref><ref name=UT6e>{{UT|6e}} (root appearing as ("''kyelep-''")</ref><ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, pp. 366-7 (root appearing as "KYELEP-")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Telerin]]: ''[[telepi|telep-, telpe]]''<ref name=UT6e/>

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[telpe|telpe, tyelpe, tyelep-]]'' ("silver")<ref name=UT6e/><ref name=LR/>

*[[Sindarin]]: ''celeb''<ref name=UT6e/>

*[[Noldorin]]: ''[[celeb]]'' ("silver"); ''[[celebren]]'' ("of silver")<ref name=LR/>

==Other versions==

The original entry in the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' had "'''KYELEP-''' and '''TELEP-''' silver". [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] rewrote the section, changing to "'''KYÉLEP-''' (and '''TÉLEP-?''') silver".<ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 25</ref>

==See also==

*[[Telerin]] ''[[telepi]]'' (derived from [[Primitive Elvish]] ''[[kyelepē]]'')<ref name=L347>{{L|347}}, p. 426 (question 4)</ref>
